name: Blue Velvet
description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

name: Bram Stocker's Dracula
description: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

name: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

name: Kwaidan
description: A collection of four Japanese folk tales with supernatural themes.

name: L'Avventura
description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

name: Lawrence of Arabia
description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

name: Memories of Murder
description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

name: Moon
description: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

name: Nosferatu
description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

name: Nymphomaniac
description: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.

name: Ran
description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

name: Repúlsion
description: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

name: Solaris
description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

name: Through a Glass Darkly
description: Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.

name: The Tree of Life
description: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

name: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
description: Surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world, based on a classical Czech novel of the same title.
